body: I'm going to start using this blog as a journal as well as my technical dump. Don't worry, the personal articles will be hidden from the general public and from the rss feed. I just need a safe place to put everything, and for now this is it. If you do, however, feel like you want to read that portion, let me know and I'll set that part up.
